alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 3:10AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN NEW LONDON... SOUTHERN MIDDLESEX AND SOUTHEASTERN NEW HAVEN COUNTIES THROUGH 400 AM EDT... At 310 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Guilford, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Clinton around 330 AM EDT. Westbrook around 335 AM EDT. Old Saybrook around 345 AM EDT. Old Lyme around 350 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London
